name: Human Intellectual Management Co.,Ltd.

Consulting company that has grown more than 300% since 2003. features: Have direct experience in applying the work system, it is not just a theory.
There is reliable information, can and meets the needs of customers.
There is development of workers. Let customers have knowledge and can practice.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: develop a human resources management system for organizations
ShortDescription: Founded in 2003 by a group of HR Experts who wanted to develop a human resources management system for organizations.
enhanced_description: Human Intellectual Management Co.,Ltd., founded in 2003 by a group of HR experts, is a consulting company specializing in the development and implementation of human resources management systems (HRMS/HCM) for organizations. They emphasize a practical application approach, ensuring clients gain hands-on knowledge and can effectively utilize the systems. The company boasts a team of full-time consultants and independent experts, many with experience as senior executives in reputable organizations, which has contributed to their significant growth of over 300% since inception by delivering reliable, needs-driven solutions.
key_use_cases: Enhancing internal HR capabilities and knowledge within client organizations
Improving hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Expert-led founding team with deep HR domain knowledge
Significant growth (>300%) since 2003, indicating market success
Team of highly experienced consultants, including former senior executives
Emphasis on practical application over theoretical approaches
Commitment to client enablement and knowledge transfer ('development of workers')
Focus on delivering reliable information and solutions that meet customer needs
implementation_scenarios: Guided system adoption and capability building
roi_benefits: Enhanced internal HR capabilities and self-sufficiency
Improved efficiency through practical system application
